<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hunter's Aim](/Feats.aspx?ID=496) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 172 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Game Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=169) (Level 6)

</column>

---

When you focus on aiming, your attack becomes particularly accurate. Make a ranged weapon Strike against your hunted prey. On this Strike, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll and ignore your prey’s concealed condition.

<title level="2">Hunter's Aim leads to...</title>
[Targeting Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=533)
name: Hunter's Aim
